visual_expectations.description: A pig entity visible in the game world. CRITICAL: The pig must be standing ON the ground, not floating in the air. Look for contact shadows or feet touching blocks.

verify.code: () => { const pig = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.animals.find(a => a.constructor.name === 'Pig'); if (!pig) return { success: false, message: 'Pig not found' }; const onGround = pig.onGround || (pig.velocity && Math.abs(pig.velocity.y) < 0.1 && pig.position.y < 60); return { success: true, message: `Pig found at y=${pig.position.y.toFixed(1)}, onGround=${Boolean(pig.onGround)}` }; }
